name: Terror Lab (itch)
description:
A short horror game where you have to find your brother in an abandonned lab

----------------

Without  news from your brother for several days, you decide to go look for him. His last location that you find from him was in the laboratory. You decided to enter in this place that you did not suspected the danger. On the spot, you felt something strange going around, what is it ?

Try to find your brother while surviving the anomaly chasing you !

----------------

Game Designer : Mathis Pham, Silouane Parent

Game Programer : Matthieu Cogez,Maxence Dupin

Game Art : Nicolas Willem (my Artstation)

----------------

This school project was completed is 3 weeks.
